description:
Work sucks and Kinji was avoiding it beautifully by investing every penny. Good plan ’til he found himself in a new world…with DEBT! Now under the rule of an evil mining company, avoiding work is gonna be a tough grind. Does he have what it takes to pull off the ultimate workaround on this gig?

(Source: Funimation)

title.native: 迷宮ブラックカンパニー

title.romaji: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
title.english: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?

title.romaji: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
title.english: KONOSUBA -God's blessing on this wonderful world!
The Vampire Dies in No Time
Miss KUROITSU from the Monster Development Department

title.romaji: Tensai Ouji no Akaji Kokka Saisei Jutsu
title.english: The Genius Prince's Guide to Raising a Nation Out of Debt

title.romaji: Otomege Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu
title.english: Trapped in a Dating Sim: The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs

title.romaji: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu
title.english: Saving 80,000 Gold in Another World for My Retirement
KamiKatsu: Working for God in a Godless World

name.native: ベルザ・シューバッハ
